title: Light, Fast & Ready-to-use
text: Microdose leverages the power of GPT4 to generate summaries, meta-descriptions and short posts depending on your desired use case and where do you want to post the content.

section.title: Why Microdose?
section.content: Because we are revolutionizing the way you will interact with your audience.

section.title: Why AI in content?
section.content: AI speciafically trained for a particular industry proves to produce much better result.
